TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DeflateStream extends System.IO.Stream

summary.span: 提供使用 Deflate 算法压缩和解压缩流的方法和属性。

span.span: Provides methods and properties for compressing and decompressing streams by using the Deflate algorithm.

remarks.format: [!INCLUDE[remarks](~/includes/remarks/System.IO.Compression/DeflateStream/DeflateStream.md)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类压缩大于 4 GB 的文件将导致异常。Using the class to compress a file larger than 4 GB will cause an exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您想要指定压缩效率或速度对于类的实例是否更重要时，可以使用此构造函数 。You use this constructor when you want to specify whether compression efficiency or speed is more important for an instance of the class. 此构造函数重载使用压缩模式 。This constructor overload uses the compression mode . 若要将压缩模式设置为另一个值，请使用 或 重载。To set the compression mode to another value, use the or overload. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在创建对象时设置压缩级别 。The following example shows how to set the compression level when creating a object. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.deflatestream/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.deflatestream/vb/program1.vb#1)]

.method public hidebysig virtual instance void CopyTo(class System.IO.Stream destination, int32 bufferSize) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub CopyTo (destination As Stream, bufferSize As Integer)
public: override void CopyTo(System::IO::Stream ^ destination, int bufferSize);
override this.CopyTo : System.IO.Stream * int -> unit

param.name: destination
param.span: 向其中复制当前 Deflate 流的内容的流。

span.span: The stream to which the contents of the current Deflate stream will be copied.

param.name: bufferSize
param.span: 缓冲区的大小。

span.span: The size of the buffer.

param.span: 此值必须大于零。

span.span: This value must be greater than zero.

param.span: 默认大小为 81920。

span.span: The default size is 81920.

summary.span: 使用指定的缓冲区大小，从当前 Deflate 流中读取字节并将其写入到另一流中。

span.span: Reads the bytes from the current Deflate stream and writes them to another stream, using a specified buffer size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 复制从当前 Deflate 流中的当前位置开始，复制操作完成后，不会重置目标流的位置。Copying begins at the current position in the current Deflate stream and does not reset the position of the destination stream after the copy operation is complete.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Threading.Tasks.Task CopyToAsync (System.IO.Stream destination, int bufferSize, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task CopyToAsync(class System.IO.Stream destination, int32 bufferSize, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
Public Overrides Function CopyToAsync (destination As Stream, bufferSize As Integer, cancellationToken As CancellationToken) As Task
public: override System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ CopyToAsync(System::IO::Stream ^ destination, int bufferSize, System::Threading::CancellationToken cancellationToken);
override this.CopyToAsync : System.IO.Stream * int * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task

param.name: destination
param.span: 向其中复制当前 Deflate 流的内容的流。

span.span: The stream to which the contents of the current Deflate stream will be copied.

param.name: bufferSize
param.span: 缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The size, in bytes, of the buffer.

param.span: 此值必须大于零。

span.span: This value must be greater than zero.

param.span: 默认大小为 81920。

span.span: The default size is 81920.

param.name: cancellationToken
param.span: 要监视取消请求的标记。

span.span: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

param.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

summary.span: 使用指定的缓冲区大小，从当前 Deflate 流中异步读取字节并将其写入到另一流中。

span.span: Asynchronously reads the bytes from the current Deflate stream and writes them to another stream, using a specified buffer size.

returns.span: 表示异步复制操作的任务。

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous copy operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `CopyToAsync`方法使你可以在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的 i/o 操作。The `CopyToAsync` method enables you to perform resource-intensive I/O operations without blocking the main thread. 在 Windows 8.x 应用商店应用或桌面应用中一个耗时的流操作可能阻塞 UI 线程并让应用看起来好像不工作时，这种性能的考虑就显得尤为重要了。This performance consideration is particularly important in a Windows 8.x Store app or desktop app where a time-consuming stream operation can block the UI thread and make your app appear as if it is not working. 异步方法与 `async` `await` Visual Basic 和 c # 中的和关键字结合使用。The async methods are used in conjunction with the `async` and `await` keywords in Visual Basic and C#. 如果在操作完成前取消该操作，则返回的任务包含 属性的值 。If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the value for the property. 复制从当前 Deflate 流中的当前位置开始。Copying begins at the current position in the current Deflate stream.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: override void Dispose(bool disposing);
override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public method and the method. 调用受保护的 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true` 。 invokes the protected method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 在设置为的情况调用 `disposing` `false` 。 invokes with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 方法。This method invokes the method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 当重写时， 请注意不要引用先前在调用时已释放的对象 。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息 ，请参阅 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关和的详细 信息 ，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged).

returns.span: 一个表示异步释放操作的任务。

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous dispose operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 `DisposeAsync` 方法，可以在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的释放操作。The `DisposeAsync` method enables you to perform a resource-intensive dispose operation without blocking the main thread. 在 Windows 8.x 应用商店应用或桌面应用中一个耗时的流操作可能阻塞 UI 线程并让应用看起来好像不工作时，这种性能的考虑就显得尤为重要了。This performance consideration is particularly important in a Windows 8.x Store app or desktop app where a time-consuming stream operation can block the UI thread and make your app appear as if it is not working. 异步方法与 `async` `await` Visual Basic 和 c # 中的和关键字结合使用。The async methods are used in conjunction with the `async` and `await` keywords in Visual Basic and C#. 此方法通过将任何更改写入后备存储并关闭流以释放资源来释放 Deflate 流。This method disposes the Deflate stream by writing any changes to the backing store and closing the stream to release resources. 调用 `DisposeAsync` 会允许出于其他目的重新分配所使用的资源 。Calling `DisposeAsync` allows the resources used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从 .NET Framework 4.5 开始，可以使用方法执行异步读取操作 。Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5, you can perform asynchronous read operations by using the method. 方法在 .NET Framework 4.5 中仍可用以支持旧代码，但你可以使用新的异步方法更轻松地实现异步 i/o 操作。The method is still available in the .NET Framework 4.5 to support legacy code; however, you can implement asynchronous I/O operations more easily by using the new async methods. 有关详细信息，请参阅[异步文件 I/O](/dotnet/standard/io/asynchronous-file-i-o)。For more information, see [Asynchronous File I/O](/dotnet/standard/io/asynchronous-file-i-o). 调用此方法以确定从流中读取的字节数。Call this method to determine how many bytes were read from the stream. 可以调用此方法一次，以返回对和的调用之间的读取字节量 。This method can be called once to return the amount of bytes read between calls to and . 此方法将一直阻塞，直到 I/O 操作已完成。This method blocks until the I/O operation has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从 .NET Framework 4.5 开始，可以使用方法执行异步写入操作 。Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5, you can perform asynchronous write operations by using the method. 方法在 .NET Framework 4.5 中仍可用以支持旧代码，但你可以使用新的异步方法更轻松地实现异步 i/o 操作。The method is still available in the .NET Framework 4.5 to support legacy code; however, you can implement asynchronous I/O operations more easily by using the new async methods. 有关详细信息，请参阅[异步文件 I/O](/dotnet/standard/io/asynchronous-file-i-o)。For more information, see [Asynchronous File I/O](/dotnet/standard/io/asynchronous-file-i-o). 对于每次调用方法，只能调用一次 。 must be called only once for every call to the method. 此方法将一直阻塞，直到 I/O 操作已完成。This method blocks until the I/O operation has completed. 在异步写入请求期间发生的错误（例如，i/o 请求过程中的磁盘故障）将在线程池线程上发生，并在调用时变为可见 。Errors that occur during an asynchronous write request, such as a disk failure during the I/O request, occur on the thread pool thread and become visible upon a call to . 调用时，线程池线程引发的异常将不可见 。Exceptions thrown by the thread pool thread will not be visible when calling .

MemberSignature.Value: public override int Read (Span<byte> buffer);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 Read(valuetype System.Span`1<unsigned int8> buffer) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Read (buffer As Span(Of Byte)) As Integer
public: override int Read(Span<System::Byte> buffer);
override this.Read : Span<byte> -> int

param.name: buffer
param.span: 内存的区域。

span.span: A region of memory.

param.span: 当此方法返回时，此区域的内容将替换为从当前源读取的字节。

span.span: When this method returns, the contents of this region are replaced by the bytes read from the current source.

summary.span: 将当前 Deflate 流中的一个字节序列读取到某字节范围，并按读取的字节数向前移动 Deflate 流中的位置。

span.span: Reads a sequence of bytes from the current Deflate stream into a byte span and advances the position within the Deflate stream by the number of bytes read.

returns.span: 读入缓冲区中的总字节数。

span.span: The total number of bytes read into the buffer.

returns.span: 如果很多字节当前不可用，则这可小于在缓冲区中分配的字节数；如果已到达流结尾，则为零 (0)。

span.span: This can be less than the number of bytes allocated in the buffer if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero (0) if the end of the stream has been reached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可确定当前实例是否支持读取。Use the property to determine whether the current instance supports reading. 使用 方法从当前流中异步读取。Use the method to read asynchronously from the current stream. 此方法从当前流中读取最多 `buffer.Length` 字节，并将它们存储在中 `buffer` 。This method read a maximum of `buffer.Length` bytes from the current stream and store them in `buffer`. Deflate 流中的当前位置由读取的字节数提前，但是，如果发生异常，则 Deflate 流中的当前位置将保持不变。The current position within the Deflate stream is advanced by the number of bytes read; however, if an exception occurs, the current position within the Deflate stream remains unchanged. 如果没有数据可用，则此方法将被阻止，直到至少有一个字节的数据可供读取。This method will block until at least one byte of data can be read, in the event that no data is available. `Read` 仅当流中没有更多的数据，但不需要更多的数据时，才会返回0， (例如关闭的套接字或文件末尾) 。`Read` returns 0 only when there is no more data in the stream and no more is expected (such as a closed socket or end of file). 即使尚未到达流的末尾，方法也可以随意返回比所请求的字节更少的字节。The method is free to return fewer bytes than requested even if the end of the stream has not been reached. 用于 读取基元数据类型。Use for reading primitive data types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ReadAsync`方法使你可以在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的 i/o 操作。The `ReadAsync` method enables you to perform resource-intensive I/O operations without blocking the main thread. 在 Windows 8.x 应用商店应用或桌面应用中一个耗时的流操作可能阻塞 UI 线程并让应用看起来好像不工作时，这种性能的考虑就显得尤为重要了。This performance consideration is particularly important in a Windows 8.x Store app or desktop app where a time-consuming stream operation can block the UI thread and make your app appear as if it is not working. 异步方法与 `async` `await` Visual Basic 和 c # 中的和关键字结合使用。The async methods are used in conjunction with the `async` and `await` keywords in Visual Basic and C#. 使用 属性可确定当前实例是否支持读取。Use the property to determine whether the current instance supports reading. 如果在操作完成前取消该操作，则返回的任务包含 属性的值 。If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the value for the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ReadAsync`方法使你可以在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的 i/o 操作。The `ReadAsync` method enables you to perform resource-intensive I/O operations without blocking the main thread. 在 Windows 8.x 应用商店应用或桌面应用中一个耗时的流操作可能阻塞 UI 线程并让应用看起来好像不工作时，这种性能的考虑就显得尤为重要了。This performance consideration is particularly important in a Windows 8.x Store app or desktop app where a time-consuming stream operation can block the UI thread and make your app appear as if it is not working. 异步方法与 `async` `await` Visual Basic 和 c # 中的和关键字结合使用。The async methods are used in conjunction with the `async` and `await` keywords in Visual Basic and C#. 使用 属性可确定当前实例是否支持读取。Use the property to determine whether the current instance supports reading. 如果在操作完成前取消该操作，则返回的任务包含 属性的值 。If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the value for the property.

param.span: 最多写入的字节数。

span.span: The maximum number of bytes to write.

summary.span: 从指定的字节数组中将压缩的字节写入基础流。

span.span: Writes compressed bytes to the underlying stream from the specified byte array.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用和方法压缩和解压缩字节 。The following example shows how to compress and decompress bytes by using the and methods. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.deflatestream/cs/program3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.deflatestream/vb/program3.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Threading.Tasks.ValueTask WriteAsync (ReadOnlyMemory<byte> buffer, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance valuetype System.Threading.Tasks.ValueTask WriteAsync(valuetype System.ReadOnlyMemory`1<unsigned int8> buffer, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
Public Overrides Function WriteAsync (buffer As ReadOnlyMemory(Of Byte), Optional cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As ValueTask
override this.WriteAsync : ReadOnlyMemory<byte> * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.ValueTask

param.name: buffer
param.span: 从中写入数据的内存区域。

span.span: The region of memory to write data from.

param.name: cancellationToken
param.span: 要监视取消请求的标记。

span.span: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

param.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

summary.span: 从指定的只读内存区域中，将压缩的字节异步写入基础 Deflate 流。

span.span: Asynchronously writes compressed bytes to the underlying Deflate stream from the specified read-only memory region.

returns.span: 表示异步写入操作的任务。

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous write operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `WriteAsync`方法使你可以在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的 i/o 操作。The `WriteAsync` method enables you to perform resource-intensive I/O operations without blocking the main thread. 在 Windows 8.x 应用商店应用或桌面应用中一个耗时的流操作可能阻塞 UI 线程并让应用看起来好像不工作时，这种性能的考虑就显得尤为重要了。This performance consideration is particularly important in a Windows 8.x Store app or desktop app where a time-consuming stream operation can block the UI thread and make your app appear as if it is not working. 异步方法与 `async` `await` Visual Basic 和 c # 中的和关键字结合使用。The async methods are used in conjunction with the `async` and `await` keywords in Visual Basic and C#. 使用 属性可确定当前实例是否支持写入。Use the property to determine whether the current instance supports writing. 如果在操作完成前取消该操作，则返回的任务包含 属性的值 。If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the value for the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `WriteAsync`方法使你可以在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的 i/o 操作。The `WriteAsync` method enables you to perform resource-intensive I/O operations without blocking the main thread. 在 Windows 8.x 应用商店应用或桌面应用中一个耗时的流操作可能阻塞 UI 线程并让应用看起来好像不工作时，这种性能的考虑就显得尤为重要了。This performance consideration is particularly important in a Windows 8.x Store app or desktop app where a time-consuming stream operation can block the UI thread and make your app appear as if it is not working. 异步方法与 `async` `await` Visual Basic 和 c # 中的和关键字结合使用。The async methods are used in conjunction with the `async` and `await` keywords in Visual Basic and C#. 使用 属性可确定当前实例是否支持写入。Use the property to determine whether the current instance supports writing. 如果在操作完成前取消该操作，则返回的任务包含 属性的值 。If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the value for the property.
